snippet: Filled with light, works and no shortage of artfully depicted dogs, her home and studio is steeped in the Canadian wilderness.
abstract: American artist Joan Jonas provides look inside her home in SoHo.
lead_paragraph: Filled with light, works and no shortage of artfully depicted dogs, her home and studio is steeped in the Canadian wilderness.

headline.main: Inside the Artist Joan Jonas’s SoHo Loft
headline.print_headline: Inspiration Doesn’t Have Far to Go
